instructions_to_main_agent: 1. SETUP: Ensure 'Barlow Condensed' and 'DM Sans' are imported in index.css from Google Fonts.
2. THEME: Force Dark Mode by default. The app should feel like a night match.
3. IMAGES: Use the provided 'jersey_placeholders' for the seed data/mock data. Do not leave empty images.
4. COMPONENTS: heavily customize Shadcn components. Remove the default 'radius' rounded-lg and go for 'rounded-md' or 'rounded-none' for a sharper, sportier look.
5. DATA-TESTID: Add data-testid to every interactive element (buttons, inputs, cards).
6. LISTS: For the 'Browse' page, use a dense grid. Do not use full-width cards for every item.
7. EMPTY STATES: If a user has no jerseys, show a 'Locker Room is Empty' state with a CTA to add the first kit.
8. DO NOT USE: Purple or Teal for main actions. Use Green (Pitch) or White (Chalk).
9. ICONS: Use Lucide-React. For 'Jersey' icon, use 'Shirt' icon.
universal_guidelines: Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients.
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy.
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur) for sticky headers.
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all.
You MUST NOT center align the app container.
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style.
NEVER use AI assistant Emoji characters.
Every interaction needs micro-animations - hover states, transitions.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Subtle grain textures, noise overlays, custom cursors.
Main agent relies on these image URLs. Missing categories = main agent will use placeholder text which is FORBIDDEN.
